tasks.lint: deno lint analytics.cjs analytics.js chichi.js elections.js group.js options.js queue.js sender.js session.js storage.js user.js utils.js
tasks.bundle: deno task lint && deno task test --fail-fast && npx esbuild chichi.js --bundle --sourcemap --outfile=build/chichi.bundle.js
tasks.build: deno task bundle && deno task transpile && deno task minify
tasks.build:es6: deno task lint && deno task test --fail-fast && npx esbuild analytics.js --bundle --sourcemap --define:'globalThis=window' --format=esm --target=es6 --minify --outfile=dist/chichi.es6.min.js
tasks.build:cjs: deno task lint && deno task test --fail-fast && npx esbuild analytics.js --bundle --sourcemap --define:'globalThis=window' --format=cjs --target=esnext --outfile=dist/analytics.bundle.cjs
